name: Pula 2 (Black Cake Studios)
description:
Pula 2 is a sequel to the game Pula. And to be specific Pula 2 is one year after the war of Pula 1. This game has a Story Mode, Arcade Mode with 4 gamemodes and 1 yearly gamemode! It also has Split-Screen CO-OP which also has 4 gamemodes.

ALSO, This game is meant to be played on aspect ratio 16:9. So if you have a different ratio you may experience bugs on the menus. If you have anything other than 1920x1080 you may experience some FOV problems in-game. CO-OP is the worst on anything other than 1980x1080.
